title: Square <I>Ding<I> (Ritual Food Vessel)
marks:
Inscription

\"Ki Wu has made King Po\'S precious
description: Square ting, rectangular, inscribed. The decor of the principal surface is confined to the upper belt, where rudimentary t\'ao-t\'ieh masks are flanked by head-turning dragons in flat relief on a ground of squared spirals. The heavy, segmented flanges at the corners of the vessel reappear as the central ridges of the forceful t\'ao-t\'ieh heads on the legs. Patina gray-green
